name: Nifty Royale X Surreal Serpentine  True Colours

metadata.description:
The design of ‘True Colours’ is inspired by the revolutionary cubism art movement.

As we peel the layers back on this character, their appearance changes. What if we do the same to you? Are you proud of what’s beneath? 

This piece was drawn traditionally, detailed and coloured in Procreate, variations done in Photoshop, and then finally animated in After Effects.
metadata.name: True Colours

attributes.value: SurrealSerpentine is a visual artist who works in Photoshop, Procreate, Blender and After Effects. Surreal has forged a body of work that is entirely unique to himself by creating all his pieces in 3-part series. Surreal’s art covers an extensive scope of subject matter, from deeper concepts such as the dark depths of the mind and spirituality, to aesthetics like collaging and abstract art.
